name: submitshop
overview:
Submitshop.Com is full seo services company based in chandigarh and specilaised in Organic SEO, link building, Contents development , social media and PPC. Submitshop was established in 1999 and managed by Mr Mohnesh Kohli who is himself SEO specialists. Submitshop is more into SEO outsourcing as well as retail marketing business having customer based in United States, Australia, United Kingdom and Europe.

Submitshop is the world’s leading provider of SEO services. With the team of experts and advance technology, and tools, we make search engine optimization accessible to everyone.

Submitshop home offices in Chandigarh, (Punjab) India serve as the base of operations, but submitshop are frequently found globetrotting across the planet with www.submitshop.co.uk based in UK, as well as participating in local and global SEO and Internet events.

The company’s goal is to provide exceptional SEO and Social Media services to all businesses, individuals, non-profits and consultants as well as SEO outsourcing.

milestones.description: Announced hire of Social Media Marketer
